question: what happened to the actor who played frost on rizzoli and isles
api_result: The actor who played Detective Barry Frost on the TV show "Rizzoli & Isles" was Lee Thompson Young. Tragically, he passed away on August 19, 2013. Lee Thompson Young died by suicide at the age of 29. His death was a significant loss to the cast and crew of the show, and his character was written out of the series with the character also passing away, which was addressed at the start of the following season. The show paid tribute to both the actor and his character in subsequent episodes.
